topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.0: Deploy the DCN Subnet Patch

body.section: This patch fixes an issue that causes Neutron subnet creation to fail when DHCP is set to No Gateway on the SharedMGMT subnet.

Download the patch
If you have not downloaded the patch, launch the Helion Distribution Network (HDN). You must obtain a user account on HDN in order to download these files. In a browser, navigate to Helion Download Network(HDN).
Click Sign In to log in using your account.
After signing in, click the Downloads link in the menu on the left side of the page.
Download the patch and the associated checksum and signature files.
Verify the downloaded signature and the downloaded checksums.
Extract the compressed file until the HCG-nuage-patch-management-gw directory is available:
Extract the HCG2.0_DCN004_Patch020.tar.gz compressed file.
Extract the metadata.tar.gz compressed file.
Extract the metadata.tar compressed file.
The HCG-nuage-patch-management-gw is inside the metadata/roles directory.

ol.li:
Log into the lifecycle manager VM. ssh <HLM_VM_IP>
where: HLM_VM_IP is the CLM IP of the lifecycle manager. Locate the IP address for the lifecycle manager in the /root/infra-ansible-playbooks/group_vars/all file under hlm_clmstaticip field.
. Copy the complete folder HCG-nuage-patch-management-gw to the /var/hlm/clouds/<cloudname>/patches directory on lifecycle manager VM
Execute following command to apply patch: hlm patch -c <cloud-name> -n HCG-nuage-patch-management-gw -t <tier-to-apply>Example: hlm patch -c sac36 -n HCG-nuage-patch-management-gw -t BASE-CCP-T2
